# p-card-container



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                         | Type                   | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ----------- |
| `active`    | `active`    | Wether the card should be hoverable | `boolean`              | `false`     |
| `hoverable` | `hoverable` | Wether the card should be hoverable | `boolean`              | `false`     |
| `shadow`    | `shadow`    | Wether the card should have shadow  | `boolean`              | `true`      |
| `variant`   | `variant`   | The variant of the container        | `"default" \| "error"` | `'default'` |
